title: AirPods Pro first look review: hands-on with Apple's new £250 headphones
text:
Apple's AirPods finally have a new look. The company has revealed a new set of earbuds that it is calling the AirPods Pro, which come with a handful of upgrades and a hefty new price tag.

The original AirPods, launched three years ago, were panned by some on their release due to their quirky half-in-half-out design.

Others found they easily slipped out of their ears. Cutting the cord and removing the headphone jack on the iPhone at the time, dubbed by Apple as an act of “courage”, did not help.

Despite this they proved immensely popular. It's estimated AirPods make up in the region of 60pc of global wireless earbud sales, outstripping rivals that offer a superior listening experience for the...
description: Apple's AirPods finally have a new look.
